description: requirement for two scanners for IP office of Canada.
full_summary:
**FlexScan Microfiche and Microfilm Scanner Tender Cancellation**

### Notice Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS4084148028 |
| Tender Reference Number | WS4084148028-Doc4100034750 |
| Publication Date | July 15, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date/Audit | August 2, 2023, 14:00:00 |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Final Tender Status | Cancelled |

### Tender Description

The Canadian Intellectual Property Office requires two Scanners to scan both microfiche and microfilms, as well as required accessories. The Scanners must be capable of scanning at high speeds and in high-quality resolution. The primary use of the Scanners is for digitizing historical documents and records for preservation and archival purposes.

### Contract Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement Category |  Goods and Services (GD) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive – Open Bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |
| Limited Tendering Reason | Nil |

### Contracting Authority and End User

The contracting authority for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (Government of Canada) and the end user is the Canadian Intellectual Property Office. 

### Contact Information

For all inquiries regarding this tender, please contact Samantha Phelan at (SPAC/PSPC) at samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Reference URL

To view the complete tender announcement, please visit http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16879733?extsite=MTY4Nzk3MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
